package com.SB;

import com.SA.student;
import com.SA.student2;
/**
 * 
 * @author teacher<br>
 * <h1>A班學員資料</h1>
 *
 */
public class A extends student implements student2{
	
	private int chi;
	/**
	 * 
	 * @param name 輸入姓名
	 * @param chi 輸入國文分數
	 * <br>
	 * EX:<br>
	 * A a =new A("a",65);
	 */
	public A(String name,int chi) {
		super(name);
		this.chi=chi;
	}
	
	 /**
	  * @param chi 輸入修改國文
	  */
	@Override	 
	public void set(int chi) {
		this.chi=chi;
		
	}
	/**
	 * @return chi 國文分數
	 */
	@Override
	public int get() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return chi;
	}
	/**
	 * 輸出詳細資料
	 * EX:<br>
	 * 名:aaa 國文:100
	 */
	@Override
	public String show() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return super.show()+"\t國文:"+get();
	}
	
	
	
	
	
	
	

}
